text: Sindhu Pushkaram is a festival of River Sindhu normally occurs once in 12 years. This Pushkaram is observed for a period of 12 days from the time of entry of Jupiter into Kumbha rasi (Aquarius). == See also == *Kumbh Mela *Pushkaram ==References== Category:Religious festivals in India Category:Water and Hinduism Category:Hindu festivals Category:Religious tourism in India Category:Hindu pilgrimages
title: Sindhu Pushkaram
